data.actual_result: There isn't a warning, which could unintentionally expose users to explicit content
data.short_description: No NSFW warning when viewing NSFW channels on the overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the overlay - Go to a server where you haven't accepted any NSFW warnings and would normally show a NSFW warning when viewing an NSFW channel on desktop - Open an NSFW channel
